name: IGI Commando Secrets Mission
description:
The IGI commando secret mission is first person shooting action game that is all about shooting and survival with your strategy.You must use all of your specialized skills to survive the onslaught of the enemy forces and avenge your fallen soldiers.Experience real gun shooting game where you are call for the ops in the ghost duty levels.
You can use a variety of weapons and shoot them,including pistols, rifles,knife and sword ,and so on shooting the enemy to command the mission. Experience intense battles against hordes of brutal enemy which attack and you must counter strike the enemy with all you have got.

IGI commando secret mission Features:

- First Person Shooting Action Game
- Realistic 3D sniper shooter Battlefield environment
- Radar vision to locate the enemies position
- Challenging missions with increasing difficulty level
- Easy tap to shoot and kill the enemies

What are you waiting for, let's take a journey and start killing.
